default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: I haven't done anything bad in the past two years. If you arrest me now, you better have a valid reason, or else... I still have six orders to settle, are you going to pay for them?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: You put so much effort into me... what dangerous work do you have for me this time?

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: I can wipe out those guys without Bai Yi's help now.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Hey, don't run around! If something bad happens, I can't save you.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Hmph! Weaker than a common Syndicate thug.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Don't just stand there! Run!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Is that all you got?

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Ha... didn't expect this kind of death...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: When did you get here? Why are you still standing around? Aren't you tired? Find a place to sit...

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: These sticks belonged to someone I knew many years ago. He died on the side of the road and I collected his corpse. Afterwards, these sticks came into my possession.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Am I stingy? If I didn't intervene, those jerks would've spent all the money in the account on booze...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Back at Whitestone, I was once tasked with finding a cat. The Syndicate was huge, and I spent a week trying to find it. When I finally returned the cat, the owner thought I was a thug and chased me away. I was pretty hurt, to tell you the truth.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: Back at Whitestone, I got up at four o'clock in the morning every day. Over here it's more relaxed.

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Before, I lived in fear every day: fear of starving, fear of getting stabbed in the back, fear of dying... but ever since I met them, nothing seems to scare me anymore...

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: I know they hide some things from me, but I don't care. I'm happy with just living a stable life with them.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I was thinking, maybe Whitestone Industries can move to your place. After all, you don't restrict our freedom too much, and you're reliable... at least more reliable than those two.

default.title: Idle
default.text: ... I've nothing to do. I wonder what Bai Yi and Che are up to. Ooh... bet they're not up to any proper business either.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: You... you're a big bully!

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Why did you find me? Got something for me to do? ...Well, if you're just visiting then do as you please.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Okay, I'll do it. Any special requests?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Done! I'm going to bed now.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Hmm, this isn't bad either.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: Time for some exercise.

undercover_fill_in.title: Obtain Attire
undercover_fill_in.text: Ummm... Bai Yi is, uh... busy, so I'm here to fill in for her. Don't stare at me like that. I know I look weird in this outfit... You think I look nice? Well, thank you.

undercover_fill_in.title: Greeting
undercover_fill_in.text: Stop looking. The contact hasn't come yet. Sigh, it's so not worth it to sacrifice this much for just one order...

undercover_fill_in.title: Ordinary Contact 1
undercover_fill_in.text: Is this tea rare and expensive? Too bad I can't tell the difference. If only Che were here. He'd know something about it.

undercover_fill_in.title: Ordinary Contact 2
undercover_fill_in.text: Don't worry about Bai Yi. She just has an upset stomach from eating leftovers. It happens all the time. Don't mind her.

undercover_fill_in.title: Idle
undercover_fill_in.text: A fruit bowl? No thanks, I'll just have some tea. It's free? Oh, leave it here then.

undercover_fill_in.title: Annoyed
undercover_fill_in.text: Are you off your rocker? If you keep this up, I'm quitting!

undercover_fill_in.title: Level Up
undercover_fill_in.text: This pastry is quite yummy. Want some?

undercover_fill_in.title: Special Attention
undercover_fill_in.text: Emm... All I have to do is sit here and wait for that person to come, right? All right, then. I'll let you know when he's here.
